entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Occasional local drifting snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
